page.title: 18Frankie's day - 2
page.content: At dinner time, 11.55 am., I walk home with Andrew because he lives just a few houses away from me along our terrace. When I get home, Dad makes my dinner and I watch it while watching a bit of film taped on the video. At 12.30 pm. I return to school and play marbles or football until the bell goes at 1.10 pm. We work till 3.30 pm and have play for 15 minutes at 2.15 pm. We work each afternoon except Wednesday when we have games for the first session. When I arrive home after school I make myself a sandwich, usually peanut butter and watch television or a film on video. I change into my old trousers and call round for my friends and we either go to the 'rec' or mess about down our street. at 7.00 pm. its evening meal time, some more TV, a shower and off to the land of dreams.
